lender.occupational_info:
Design for Social Good is a design and development company leveraging creative media and Web 2.0 technologies for social GOOD. Using innovative design solutions to highlight critical social dilemmas, we take a fresh approach to solving old problems.
Our mission is to work as change agents in the fields of design and social activism. Our intent is to help non-profits better reach their goals through the technologies of Web 2.0, so that together we can reach the goals of social change. Our experienced high-end design team and savvy social media strategies build dynamic online communities, leveraging our Internet marketing skills.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I went to a very difficult time loosing my house, loosing a car, financial difficulties after divorce, and I so on. I would like to be able to promote my page in a way I could sell over the internet. I do not have the finances to make it more current and to promote it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of 4 children, and 6 grandchildren. I was born in USA, and raised in Peru, South America. When I came back, I enrolled at night school to learn English, and later I graduated from Human Services Program. I tried to attend University several times, but i was not able to continue due to my family responsibilities. I am a single mother now raising a child who loves to sing at church, and family gatherings. Her goal is to continue a higher education on music and mine is to provide the support her efforts reaching her goal. A few years ago, I started as a sole business to promote Peruvian arts and crafts, and more. Later, I changed into a business partnership which lead us to become independent business on our own now. The partnership was a very rewarding experience where I learned so much from people I meet, and from every challenge I took. In this journey through the years, I learned about the places of the villages where families make the items from their own homes, and I go onto festivals and fairs here in our country to exhibit and sale the items. I have committed myself to provide a space to share with other communities the delicate and detailed work of artists. The items vary from home decorations, to textiles, and arts and crafts. I invite you to visit my page and see for yourself.

lender.occupational_info:
Starting a grocery store business may pose as a challenge if you are not equipped with the proper information. The business has several aspects that you need to focus on and study if you want your efforts to yield results.
Begin with yourself. You don‚Äôt need to have prior retailing experience. All you need is the right attitude and the ‚Äòcustomer-first‚Äô mindset. An effective grocery store owner knows how to multitask. He is able to make swift yet calculated decisions. He is hard working and is not afraid to work long hours.
